name: Border Right
content:
# Border Right

The `border-right` property specifies the width, line style, and color of the right border of an element. It is a shorthand property for setting in one declaration the width, the style, and the color of an element's right border.

examples.name: Border Right Property
examples.description: Setting the style of the right border of `<h1>` for different elements.

short_description:
Border Right
The border-right property specifies the width, line style, and color of the right border of an element. It is a shorthand property for setting in one declaration the width, the style, and the color of an element's right border.
tips:
* If `border-style` is not provided, the default is no border.
* If no `border-color` is chosen, the border color will match the current text color.
* If `border-width` is not provided, the default is `medium`.
